Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1966...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1967, off Herm Starrette (BOS)...
Earned first career win on 4/6/1967...
Injured on 9/22/1968 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Struck out 15 batters against Texas on 7/10/1970...
Pitched NO-HITTER against California on 5/11/1971, striking out 13...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1972, going 5-0, 0.88...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1975, going 7-0, 1.61...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1977, going 5-0, 1.20...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1977, going 4-0, 0.82...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1977, going 4-0, 1.20...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1978, going 4-3, 1.06...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1978, going 6-1, 1.85...
Won Cy Young Award in 1978, going 24-10, 2.08 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/1/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $19,987,456 per year...
Injured on 5/3/1980 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Struck out 15 batters against Chicago (A) on 8/24/1980...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1981...
Struck out 15 batters against Baltimore on 4/1/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1982, winning 2 games with a 1.59 ERA...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
